analysis.key_quote: I am writing to express strong opposition to the Office of Personnel Management’s (OPM) proposed rule OPM-2025-0004-0001, which seeks to reclassify many federal employees into a newly designated Schedule Policy/Career (P/C) category.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, emphasizing the importance of maintaining merit-based hiring and protections against politicization, which aligns with concerns about the integrity of the civil service.
